successes.title: THE LONG DARK, a post-disaster survival experience
successes.description: THE LONG DARK is a first-person post-disaster survival experience set in the Northern wilderness. How far will you go to survive?

Pledges.description: EARLY BIRD discount for $20 tier.
ALL DIGITAL

ONE DOWNLOADABLE COPY of The Long Dark for PC, Mac, or Linux and an exclusive wallpaper. Access to a PRIVATE BACKER COMMUNITY (includes exclusive developer updates and first-look screenshots and video) . Also receive a KICKSTARTER BACKER badge for display in The Long Dark forums.
ALL DIGITAL

Receive an exclusive in-game LOCKET that holds a picture of loved ones, which enhances the player's will to live when gazed upon.   This locket is for backers only, and will not be available in game (a loose Polaroid will be used instead).  In addition, gain the ability TO USE A PHOTO OF YOUR CHOICE in the locket.   Note that the photo will fade when viewed, so use it sparingly!
Includes all $20 tier rewards.  This tier is included for tiers $25 and above.
ALL DIGITAL, REVISED VERSION

Receive an exclusive in-game LOCKET with ENGRAVED HINTERLAND LOGO that holds a picture of loved ones, which enhances the player's will to live when gazed upon.   This locket will be in the starting inventory for backers who pledge $25 or more (and cannot be found in game).  This is a COSMETIC reward only and offers no gameplay advantage over using the default Polaroid inventory item.  Players will be able to switch between using the locket and Polaroid at any time.  All backers will be able to use a photo of their choice for the locket or Polaroid.  Note that your photo will fade when viewed, so use it sparingly!
Includes all $20 tier rewards.  This tier is included for tiers $25 and above.
ALL DIGITAL
DOWNLOADABLE SOUNDTRACK by award-winning composers Cris Velasco and Sascha Dikiciyan. Also receive a DOWNLOADABLE CONCEPT ART BOOK.
Includes all $20 tier rewards.
ALL DIGITAL
EARLY ACCESS to the Beta and a downloadable version of "The Making of The Long Dark" BEHIND THE SCENES RETROSPECTIVE. Also get a SECOND DOWNLOADABLE COPY of the game.
Includes all $30 tier rewards.
PHYSICAL GOODS
Exclusive 19" x 13" POSTER of The Long Dark.
Includes all $40 tier rewards.
Add $15 CAD for shipping outside Canada/USA.
PHYSICAL GOODS

This new tier is for backers who want an EXCLUSIVE T-SHIRT along with the game for one low price.  Receive a high quality exclusive T-shirt (S, M, L, XL) designed for Kickstarter backers only.  Choice of Men's or Women's sizing.  Remember this tier is just the T-shirt and rewards from the $20 tier (downloadable game + wallpaper + private backer community + Kickstarter backer badge)!
Add $15 CAD for shipping outside Canada/USA.
PHYSICAL GOODS
DVD of the game in an exclusive The Long Dark BRANDED DVD HARDCASE.
Includes all $40 tier rewards.
Add $15 CAD for shipping outside Canada/USA.
